summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SalesGenius product search functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend has authentication and routing issues preventing full product page testing, but widget integration requires deployment configuration.

ui_bugs.issue: Cannot navigate to /products page - redirects back to landing page
ui_bugs.impact: Blocks manual product management via UI

ui_bugs.issue: Widget.js not loading on landing/demo pages
ui_bugs.impact: Product cards in chat not testable via frontend

integration_issues.issue: Dashboard login works but navigation to protected routes fails

passed_tests: Get all products API - returns product list
Create product API - manual product creation working
Update product API - product updates working
Delete product API - product deletion working
Search products API - product search by query working
Add to cart API - cart functionality working
Get cart contents API - cart retrieval working
Remove from cart API - cart item removal working
Chat message API - AI product search working
AI product search returns product cards via API

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (login works, but products page and widget not accessible)

critical_fixes: Fix frontend routing - /products page navigation not working (redirects to landing page)
Fix protected routes authentication - dashboard accessible but sub-pages fail
Configure widget.js deployment - widget not loading on frontend pages
recommendations: Verify React Router configuration for /products route
Check authentication middleware for protected routes
Ensure widget.js is properly embedded with correct widget key
Test widget integration on a separate demo HTML page
